renderer::VBOAccess

renderer::VBOAccess Namespace Reference

VBO access modes to mapped memory.


Enumerations

enum  { READ_ONLY, WRITE_ONLY, READ_WRITE }

Enumeration Type Documentation

anonymous enum

Enumerator:
READ_ONLY  Access is read only.
WRITE_ONLY  Access is write only (mapped memory area does not correspond to buffer data).
READ_WRITE  Bidirectional access.
